message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product offers unparalleled value and efficiency, making it an excellent investment for your business. Considering its high quality and the benefits it provides, I propose a price of $9,500 for this exceptional item.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit high for my budget.  This product would be really useful for me, but I'd need to be closer to $7,000 to make it work.

Thank you for considering our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. To make it more feasible for you, I am willing to negotiate the price down to $8,200. This still allows us to cover our costs while providing you with a valuable solution for your needs.
I appreciate you coming down on the price, Alice.  To be honest, I have a hard limit at $8,000.  If you can meet that, I'm ready to close the deal today.
